item.title: Welcome to My Digital Space
item.description:
Hi, I’m Thomas 👋

A Linux enthusiast and hobby developer from the Netherlands with a passion for automation and open source. I specialize in:

  • 🐧 Linux System Configuration
  • 🔧 Shell Scripting (Bash)
  • ⚙️ Infrastructure as Code (YAML)
  • 🤖 GitHub Actions Automation
  • 🖥️ WSL Development

Currently working on a BlendOS config, an immutable Arch Linux setup with a focus on developer productivity and my own needs.
